channel.title: Please help
channel.description: Well i have a problem on my server connections. the players keep disconecting from the server and when they do they cant log back on and i have to restart the server its been doing that alot today wasnt like that yesterday. Idk whats wrong please help me.

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @r_4_v_1 r 4 v 1
item.description:
@r_4_v_1 wrote:

Tryme, i have had the same problems, well the way to resolve it is to create a new character, delete the old (e.gâ€¦ like Tryme, you log on you log out, go to your character folder, copy the stuff you need to, then delete him, then create him again, then go to your character folder, and edit stats if you want to ok :)?

                                                      Thanks, R 4 V 1 ;)
